semantic_identifier: [GOLD-51]: Add positioning change log with versioning and timestamps
title: Add positioning change log with versioning and timestamps

sections.text: Implement an immutable audit log for positioning recommendations (value props, differentiators, proof points, objections) that records who changed what, when, and which segment/ICP the change applies to. Store each edit as a new version with a stable version ID and effective timestamp, and expose a read-only history endpoint for later attribution work. This provides the foundational data needed to correlate downstream outcomes to specific positioning changes.
